DOC.criteria: Volunteers must meet definition metabolic syndrome ( base IDF consensus statement ) . Screening biochemical test liver , kidney , hematologic , metabolic ( ) thyroid function must normal . The volunteer must willing : 1. visit outpatient GCRC clinic monthly 16 week intervention , 2. participate supervise exercise training ( assign ) 3. enter inpatient GCRC 23 day intensive study baseline 16 week intervention . The subject must provide voluntary fully inform write consent . Type 1 diabetes , drug alcohol abuse , psychosis , severe untreated depression , dementia , polycythemia ( hematocrit > 55 % ) , clinically symptomatic coronary artery , pulmonary orthopedic disease ( would disallow exercise training ) , history vascular peripheral nerve trauma , lymph node dissection , anemia , uncontrolled hypertension ( > 160/105 untreated > 145/95 treat ) , allergic octafluoropropane , nitroglycerine , weight loss gain 2 kg within precede 10 day , investigational drug use within five biological halflives , treatment ACE inhibitor ARBs , thiazolindiones , 1st 2nd generation antipsychotic insulin , Viagra , unwillingness provide write informed voluntary consent , pregnant , breast feeding use hormonal birth control .
